translation.en: ♪ I can feel it ♪ ♪ Coming in the air tonight ♪
[man] Just when you think it's all over,
translation.zh: 正当你以为一切都已尘埃落定的时候

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.zh: 一股不可言说的力量 袭击了你和你的亲人

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood,
translation.zh: 残忍地杀害了你妹妹珍妮

translation.en: But a clue left behind leads us here,
translation.zh: 不过 现场留下了一条线索 把我们带到了这里
这家位于曼谷的夜总会

translation.en: And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.zh: 这也是为什么我们依然 需要依仗五行刺客的力量

translation.en: [man] All right. So about a year ago,
translation.zh: 是这样的 大约一年前

translation.en: my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.zh: 我们几个朋友在三藩市过着逍遥日子

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant,
translation.zh: 我和妹妹珍妮经营着一家餐馆

translation.en: and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.zh: 我兄弟陆新做着汽车生意

translation.en: A 10,000-year-old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.zh: 一个有万年修为的武者之魂再现人间

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend.
translation.zh: 她把功力尽数传给了 我最铁的兄弟阿凯

translation.en: And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
translation.zh: 于是他就成了最后一位 五行刺客 差不多这样吧
你是说像“复仇者联盟”那样？
嗯 不过是亚裔版的

translation.en: Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
translation.zh: 不对 其实更像那部七十年代的剧集

translation.en: Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.zh: 阿凯和陆新是天使 我是查理

translation.en: -[man 2] You seeing this? -[man 3] You know why we're here.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？他们知道我们的来意

translation.en: He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
[man] He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.zh: 他的速度和力量都远超常人 自称“死亡之器”

translation.en: Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
translation.zh: 他没有超能力 只是打架很厉害

translation.en: So why aren't you with them?
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
translation.zh: 要不要换个地方继续聊？

translation.en: Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
translation.zh: 你们为什么来曼谷？这里有什么？

translation.en: I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.zh: 我根据这个东西追到了泰国

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
translation.zh: 这是一块非常古老的石头

translation.en: Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
translation.zh: 阿凯！上面！ 他在吸人

translation.en: [man] I found it in my dead sister's hand.
translation.zh: 我妹妹死去的时候把它攥在手里

translation.en: Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.zh: 阿凯、陆新和我回到我们家的餐馆

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.zh: 她倒在地上 已经死了
好吧 敬你妹妹一杯

translation.en: You want to know a secret?
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
translation.zh: 喝了会变成僵尸 对不对？

translation.en: [breathing heavily] I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
translation.zh: 你的力量对我不起作用

translation.en: That's not what I was thinking at all.
Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.zh: 喂！这是怎么回事？ 喂！按“继续”键啊

translation.en: It's me. I need your help.
translation.zh: 是我 我需要你的帮助

translation.en: [man's voice] No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.zh: 明早八点 是隆寺考古发掘基地

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.zh: 到时详谈 五行刺客

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.zh: 我再也不跟你一起泡夜店了
-刚才那是谁？ -我们应该联系汤米
嗯 她什么都不知道

translation.en: I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.zh: 这个考古发掘基地 属于一位生物科技大亨

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.zh: 目前对他所知甚少 但那座大楼是他的产业

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
translation.zh: 那我们是在闯他的地盘？

translation.en: If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.zh: 我们离找到杀害珍妮的凶手 又近了一步 这就行了

translation.en: [Tommy] It should be up on the right.

translation.zh: 潘威廉的公司成立于1999年

translation.en: William Pan has formed collaboration agreements
translation.zh: 自此之后 他和多位全球巨头
建立了广泛的合作关系

translation.en: Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
translation.zh: 为科学家提供机会和资源

translation.en: to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.zh: 解决人类最复杂的难题

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.zh: 也是为了实现潘威廉的独特设想

translation.en: We're not just looking to the future…
translation.zh: 我们不仅是在着眼未来
我们是在着手创造未来

translation.en: I know my message was unorthodox.
translation.zh: 我知道我的传话方式有些特殊

translation.en: I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我当时无法亲自与各位见面 用那种方式沟通并不容易

translation.en: Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
translation.zh: 你们知道盘古的传说吗？

translation.en: The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness
translation.zh: 创世者 从虚无中开辟万物

translation.en: and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
We all went to Chinese school.
Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu
translation.zh: 但中文学校没有告诉你们
他掌握着力量 失去了理智

translation.en: Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.zh: 企图按自己的构想重造世界
天道拥有宇宙的无极智慧

translation.en: called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.zh: 召唤出第一代五行刺客 对抗这位创世者

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order.
translation.zh: 阴与阳 混乱与秩序

translation.en: These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.zh: 千百年来 这些力量此消彼长

translation.en: But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.zh: 但多亏有了你 我会是最后一个

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced,
translation.zh: 在这个失去平衡的世界

translation.en: chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.zh: 我和混乱终于有机会 结束这场无尽的对抗

translation.en: And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
translation.zh: 因此 我来到这里避难

translation.en: while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.zh: 而我的双生异相则继续制造混乱

translation.en: You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi.
translation.zh: 你们可能已经 听说过她的大名 谷安琪

translation.en: She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.zh: 她正在扩张势力 消除一切反对力量

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
translation.zh: 吸收精气以增强自己的功力

translation.en: The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.zh: 中国的少林僧人、爱尔兰的德鲁伊

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.zh: 上个月 她去了三藩市

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you,
She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.zh: 如果无人阻拦 她会狂扫一切

translation.en: How do you know all this?
[William] Because Ku and I are connected.
translation.zh: 因为谷安琪和我是一体的

translation.en: That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.zh: 如果我暴露自己 她一定会过来

translation.en: This whole thing could be bullshit.
translation.zh: 他说的可能都是骗人的

translation.en: [William] In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.zh: 在打斗过程中 你妹妹拿到了 谷安琪的一件东西 一个符记
我猜 她的在你手上

translation.en: It's a piece of our Essence.
-She'll try to get it back. -Good. Send her my way.
translation.zh: -她会抢回来 -很好 叫她来找我

translation.en: In two days' time, my worse half
translation.zh: 两天后 我的另一半 会与三合会的五大首脑会面

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel,
translation.zh: 两天后 我的另一半 会与三合会的五大首脑会面 以此巩固她的势力 地点在VIE酒店
以此巩固她的势力 地点在VIE酒店
到处是摄像头 绝不允许武器入内

translation.en: -There's no honor in guns. -And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.zh: -严禁带枪 -你的思想她也会知道吧？

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
translation.zh: 我在努力向她隐藏自己的思想

translation.en: My powers extend to the mind,
while hers are focused on the body.
A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.zh: 五个三合会老大 他们所有的手下
我有个更好的主意 不如你用意识操纵法

translation.en: Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.zh: 我有个更好的主意 不如你用意识操纵法 派一支军队去打他们怎么样？
我无法控制一整支军队

translation.en: I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute.
translation.zh: 我可以在很短的时间里 连接、沟通、控制思想

translation.en: -[Lu Xin sighs] -But that is the extent of my powers now.
translation.zh: 但目前来说 我的力量到此为止

translation.en: Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.zh: 看来你什么都有 就是没办法

translation.en: When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
translation.zh: 抓到谷安琪之后 把她和符记一起带到我这里

translation.en: and I'll take care of the rest.
No. You said the Dao is broken.
translation.zh: 不 你说天道已经被破坏

translation.en: But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.zh: 但我们一起可以重建天道

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
[Lu Xin] The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.zh: 但是这个人 或者这个神 就是杀害珍妮的凶手

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.zh: 我明白 所以我们必须慎重

translation.en: -Look at the pieces in front of us. -This isn't a game.
translation.zh: -仔细考虑每一步 -这不是在下棋

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.zh: 这就是在下棋 所有的一切都是一个局 汤米

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
translation.zh: 现在的形势对我们很有利 我们应该把握机会

translation.en: If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
translation.zh: 如果你为了你妹妹 想一心赴死 别把我扯进…

translation.en: You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
translation.zh: 我看你根本不在乎珍妮！

translation.en: -[Lu Xin] That's the game. No one's safe. -[Tommy] Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.zh: -那是我们的目标 可是太危险了 -操你妈的

translation.en: -Yeah, fuck you too. -[Kai] Guys! Calm down.
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.zh: 谷安琪想要的是五行刺客 我会给她五行刺客 我自己去

translation.en: -No. -It might not be the smartest choice,
translation.zh: -不行 -这样也许不是最好的办法

translation.en: but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
translation.zh: 但这是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.zh: 管他的 不行 我自己去

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai?
translation.zh: 阿凯 知道你的问题是什么吗？

translation.en: You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.zh: 你以为自己有超能力 所以你比我们都强

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
translation.zh: 好像我们都是你的累赘

translation.en: Lu Xin is calling his contact.
Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
translation.zh: 他能不能发射火箭弹干掉谷安琪？
这可说不定 法力无边

translation.en: Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.zh: 手指放松 这样容易一点

translation.en: I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
translation.zh: 我一定要去 不管你怎么想
我非去不可 明白吗？

translation.en: You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.zh: 如果你露出半点怒色 你就没命了

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
translation.zh: 这样是不能战胜敌人的

translation.en: You got to understand, though, man.
translation.zh: 兄弟 可是你应该明白

translation.en: It's the only thing I have.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰了你们的日光浴

translation.en: Bad news. [sighs] The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me.
translation.zh: 坏消息 找我们对付僵尸的那家伙 把我拉黑了

translation.en: Too much heat at the club.
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi,
translation.zh: 我一提到要对付谷安琪

translation.en: I might know someone crazy enough to help.
translation.zh: 我也许认识一个人 够胆帮这个忙

translation.en: What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
translation.zh: 什么？你什么时候在曼谷找了对象？

translation.en: I said "might." I'll hit her up.
translation.zh: 我说也许 我会联系她

translation.en: Something just doesn't feel right about this.
translation.zh: 这件事怎么都感觉不对劲

translation.en: -Hey! -It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with.

translation.zh: 你有什么事 汤玛士？

translation.en: Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.zh: 汤玛士？ 首先 为什么要在这里见面？

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
translation.zh: 再说这里是公共场所 因为…
不管怎么说 安全第一嘛

translation.en: [man] You know who I work for?

translation.zh: 国际刑警 管全世界的警察

translation.en: We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.zh: 我们知道你所属的三合会 要和谷安琪会面 她是在案恐怖分子

translation.en: You might wanna call in the cleaners.
I thought he gave you the information.
The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.zh: 我是说真正的清洁工 他拉了一裤子
普丽雅 这两位是我兄弟
兄弟们 这是普丽雅

translation.en: -Lu, is that a "Sin" or a "Xin"? -Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.zh: -“陆新” 还是“芦笋”？ -这是个段子吗？
-他这人怎么了？ -没关系 他人很好的

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.
That's too bad. I love Jen.
translation.zh: 好可惜 我超喜欢阿珍的

translation.en: Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.zh: 言归正传 听说你们在执行自杀任务

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
translation.zh: 搞什么屁？汤玛士 你告诉她了？

translation.en: It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.zh: 只有这样她才肯帮忙 我全都告诉她了 没错 我喜欢心里有数

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
translation.zh: 没错 我喜欢心里有数

translation.en: If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.zh: 既然你知道了 为什么还要帮忙？

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.zh: 一点武斗我无所谓的 这是风土人情

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.zh: 你们要对付的这个女人 是个厉害角色 很多人会死
祝购物愉快 小伙子们
汤米？ -嗯 -你和她怎么认识的？

translation.en: How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.zh: 我五年前来曼谷的时候 有人抢了我的LV包包

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything.
translation.zh: 我报警了 警方却毫无作为

translation.en: -So, someone told me to go talk to-- -Uh.
translation.zh: 然后有人指点我去找普丽雅…

translation.en: I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet,
in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.zh: 他被打劫过 而且对她一无所知

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
translation.zh: 听我说 她是我们唯一的关系 我们需要她帮忙

translation.en: -We need this. -[Preeya] And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.zh: 听我说 她是我们唯一的关系 我们需要她帮忙 寒不择衣 慌不择路

translation.en: -[Tommy] Did you get it? -[Preeya] Yes, every goddamn thing.
translation.zh: -弄到了吗？ -当然 一样不少

translation.en: Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道这不关我的事

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.zh: 不过我喜欢这家伙 所以我说啊 你们的计划…

translation.en: There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.zh: 你们想把这些家伙 弄进VIE酒店是不可能的

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.zh: 安保非常严密 而且只有正门一条路

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.zh: 我认为不行 我们必须重新考虑

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.zh: 不 明天我们一起去 一起为珍妮报仇

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
translation.zh: 嗯 凶手就是我们的目标

translation.en: I can help you get in.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.zh: 那里的安保严密 但我们也可以利用这一点

translation.en: Is this your idea of a joke?
[Preeya] Wow. What's so special about them?
translation.zh: 为什么？这玩意有什么特别的？

translation.en: We're gonna get justice for her.
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
[Tommy] Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
translation.zh: 我们怎么了？我们什么都没有做！

translation.en: -All right. Easy. Easy. -[Tommy] Can I talk to your manager?

translation.zh: 嘿 我们只是来度假的

translation.en: One-star Yelp review on the way!
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.zh: 让酒店安保处理 你只需要专心…

translation.en: It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
translation.zh: 这是宋干节用的 泰国的泼水节

translation.en: Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
translation.zh: 那又怎样？我们喜欢提前准备

translation.en: Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
translation.zh: 现在 你把她的行李收拾好

translation.en: You for real? [Tommy] Yes, I'm for real.
-[guard] Bullshit! -[Tommy] Look at all this mess.
translation.zh: 乱来！ 都乱成什么样了！

translation.en: [in English] Where is our fucking visual?
-I'm working on it. -[Zulu] Our gear is still working.
translation.zh: -我在处理 -我们的设备没有问题

translation.en: Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.zh: 不管现在出的是什么事 干扰的只是酒店

translation.en: [Ku An Qi, in Thai] You are my men now.
Come on. Let's get out of here.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
-[Zulu] Hands where I can see 'em. -[gun cocks]
-[Kai] You know her? -Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.zh: 我当时在走私阿斯顿马丁 找的中介居然是个国际刑警

translation.en: -Look, hey, these bodies-- -Get down on your knees!
This wasn't us. So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
translation.zh: -不是我们干的 -你不小心走进了屠杀现场？

translation.en: Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
translation.zh: 扎玛 你了解我的 你认为我会做这种事？

translation.en: There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
translation.zh: 我对你知之甚少 陆

translation.en: This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.zh: 这件事情的复杂程度 不是你可以想象的

translation.en: Try me. The fate of the world.
translation.zh: -那就解释 -事关全世界的命运

translation.en: Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.zh: 布歇探员 我这里有两名嫌犯 我需要支援

translation.en: Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.zh: 杀了他们的人很可能也杀了你的人

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, -and get down on the floor. -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 十指交叉 放在脑后 跪下

translation.en: -I don't want to hurt you. -Kai. Don't.
translation.zh: -我不想伤害你 -阿凯 别这样

translation.en: Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.zh: 听你朋友的话 他似乎比较理智

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.zh: 这话我第一次听说 把枪放下

translation.en: -What the fuck happened here? -We're working on it.
translation.zh: -这他妈是怎么回事？ -我们正在研究

translation.en: Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.zh: 放开她 她没有危险 拜托

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.zh: 听着 很明显坏人不是我们

translation.en: -I got it. -I'm just looking out for you.
translation.zh: -我没问题的 -我只是在关心你

translation.en: -Because that's always been your MO. -Here we go again.
[Preeya] Did you guys, like, used to date or--
translation.zh: 你们之前是不是…交往过什么的？

translation.en: The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.zh: 抓五行刺客 我就会得到力量

translation.en: Looks like you're not the only special one.
translation.zh: 看来你不是唯一的超能者

translation.en: [Tommy] Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.

translation.zh: 门上写了“推” 不是“拉”

translation.en: Don't worry about Kai, all right?
-[Lu Xin] Yo, we gotta go. Come on. -My van's still here. Come on!
translation.zh: -我们必须离开这里 -我的车还在 走吧！

translation.en: -[Lu Xin] What happened back there? -What happened in here?
translation.zh: -那边发生什么事了？ -这里发生什么事了？

translation.en: If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.zh: 我说事情可疑 你不相信

translation.en: Get me out of here now.
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
translation.zh: 如果你以为我们把他们甩掉了 你想错了

translation.en: Can you get to Khaosan Road?

translation.zh: -我们在那里有间安全屋 -可以

translation.en: [Zulu] It's the end of the road.
-She's locking down the city. -What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: -她封锁了整座城市 -我们怎么办？

translation.en: I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
translation.zh: 我开始对你越来越反感了

translation.en: We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.zh: 我们跑到运河边 坐船沿湄南河而上

translation.en: [Ku An Qi, in Thai] Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
[in English] I changed my mind. I like the plan.
translation.zh: 我改变想法了 真是好计划

translation.en: -If you wanna join me, guns are up top. -[Preeya] Come on.
translation.zh: 如果你们想帮忙 枪在上面 快点啊

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
translation.zh: 看这个 打倒那些王八蛋！

translation.en: [Lu Xin] They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
translation.zh: 他们要把我们烧死 走！

translation.en: ♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
translation.zh: 各位 我们可以谈判吗？

translation.en: -♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ -Good timing.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.zh: 自从你玩消失之后 我学了不少东西

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.zh: 如果我没走 就要坐牢了

translation.en: -[Kai] Get us out of here! -[Tommy] Come on!
[Lu Xin] Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
translation.zh: 我还以为再也见不到你了

translation.en: [Tommy, in English] Everyone's excited to see you.
-It's been a while since I was last here. -[Tommy] What about your family?
translation.zh: -我很久没回来了 -你的家人呢？

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
translation.zh: 如果你不受欢迎 就不能过去

translation.en: I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
He knows everything about the supernatural.
translation.zh: 他对超自然的力量无所不知

translation.en: If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.zh: 如果察猜不知道 就没人知道了

translation.en: [in Thai] You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你以前说我是江湖骗子

translation.en: [in English] It's nice to meet everyone.
[Chatree] Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.zh: 接待如此贵客是我的荣幸

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.zh: 泰国的规矩是 一吃饱饭 二谈正事

translation.en: One that I just made up.
There will always be people after you.
translation.zh: 你们的背后永远有人在追赶

translation.en: But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.zh: 不过 有意思的是 这个手镯是你的

translation.en: But it is not for you.
You speak like Yoda, old man.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.zh: 潘威廉没对你们说实话

translation.en: Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.zh: 潘威廉和谷安琪是两股相对的力量

translation.en: But they are not in opposition to each other.
translation.zh: 但他们不是敌对的双方

translation.en: They are two halves of a whole.
They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.zh: 共同出生、生活、死亡、转世

translation.en: And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.zh: 用他们的力量 把世界改造成 他们想要的样子

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken,
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.zh: 找到分开他们二人的人 吸收他的精气

translation.en: The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.zh: 他们二人分别拿着一个元气的符记

translation.en: forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.zh: 用他们分开时所在的寺庙的石头炼成

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.zh: 如果他们能利用阿凯的精气 把两块石头合为一体

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
translation.zh: 他们就能把两半融为整体

translation.en: Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.zh: 如果它是谷安琪的一部分 我们只需要把它毁掉…

translation.en: I've had quite enough, thank you.
This… This whole thing is just crazy. [sighs]
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.zh: 这些超自然和世界末日的事情

translation.en: What did you do when you first found out?
translation.zh: 你第一次听说的时候是什么反应？

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.zh: 那时我刚刚把一个俄国匪徒爆了头

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
translation.zh: 我给自己倒了满满一杯

translation.en: Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.zh: 总比我们在红砖巷喝的中国烧酒好

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
translation.zh: 嗯 不过那是工作要求 所以…

translation.en: -[sighs] -Is that what I was to you?
I can taste when you're lying.
translation.zh: 你说谎的时候我尝得出来

translation.en: -[Kai] You're not worried about us losing? -[Chatree] No, I'm not.
Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.zh: 因为如果事情真的发生了 盘古会重造世界

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.zh: 而我们就是庄生 梦中的蝴蝶 消失无踪

translation.en: But that is the one thing
that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.zh: 是五行刺客无法拥有的

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.zh: 他可能疏远了他的朋友

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them.

translation.zh: 你已经失去了一个朋友
避免再次经历那种伤痛

translation.en: But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.zh: 盘古的目的是掌握一切

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
translation.zh: 你想要什么 五行刺客？

translation.en: We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
translation.zh: 我们会阻止他 我们会做计划

translation.en: There is the path that leads to the main road.
From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
translation.zh: 上了大路之后 无论要去哪里 都可以畅通无阻

translation.en: You did not come here to train
translation.zh: 你来这里不是为了练功

translation.en: Last time I was here was, um…
translation.zh: 我上一次在这里 是在…

translation.en: Family had a farm by the river.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.zh: 水势很猛 然后…突然之间

translation.en: No clash for the world. It was, uh,
translation.zh: 也不是世界毁灭 只是…

translation.en: There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.zh: 无论我做什么 我家人都不可能回来

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.zh: 但我以为 我可以帮你为阿珍报仇

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
translation.zh: 至少你还有事情可以做

translation.en: [William] It's the version of the village in your mind
from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again.
translation.zh: 但我们可以把它重新创造出来

translation.en: We can make it into whatever we want.
translation.zh: 可以把它变成你想要的任何样子
你们可以再次团圆 永远在一起

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
-[in English] What are you doing? -I had no choice.
-There's more down there. Let's go. -[Lu Xin] Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.zh: -下面还有人 我们走 -喂！汤米 等等！

translation.en: I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here.
translation.zh: 我们会挡住他们 等两个姑娘过来

translation.en: -No. She wouldn't. -What? She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
translation.zh: -不 她不会的 -她拿了谷安琪的项链
-操 -陆 去叫扎玛 汤米 去开车！

translation.en: -Hold on. We're stronger together. -Just do as I say!
translation.zh: -等等 人多力量大 -听我的！

translation.en: Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
translation.zh: 普丽雅背叛了我们 我们必须马上走

translation.en: I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我知道 我看到她 和潘威廉的人走了 我们走

translation.en: You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go!
translation.zh: 一切在你手中 走吧！

translation.en: -No! Chatree! -[Lu Xin] Get in the car!
-[Zulu] We need to go! -[Lu Xin] Drive, Tommy!
translation.zh: -我们非走不可！ -汤米 开车！
我们不应该抛下察猜的

translation.en: -Should have listened to me. -There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.zh: -应该听我的 -没有什么可听的

translation.en: -I made a decision. -Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
translation.zh: -我已经决定了 -是啊 总是这样 阿凯

translation.en: -I'm leading us. -No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.zh: -是我在领头 -不是 你是在抛下我们

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
translation.zh: 各位 我们专心做现在该做的事

translation.en: I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.zh: 对不起 你没资格说话

translation.en: -What the fuck you talking about? -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.zh: -你他妈说什么？ -什么叫“我他妈说什么”？

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
translation.zh: 你带来的小美女背叛了我们

translation.en: [Tommy] You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.zh: 你不也大意了吗？你在忙着睡扎玛

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.zh: 还有阿凯 你那时在干什么？ 你心里打着什么主意？

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
translation.zh: 我的主意是自己去杀潘威廉和谷安琪

translation.en: -Like I should have done. -Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.zh: -我早该这么做的 -嗯？很好 因为你永远是对的

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you. True! I'm going myself.
translation.zh: -对 我不需要你们 -好吧 我自己去

translation.en: -Get the fuck out of here! -[Zulu] Just stop it!
All of you. You're acting like little children.
translation.zh: 你们都住嘴 不要这么幼稚

translation.en: Do I need to remind you
translation.zh: 我是不是还要提醒你们

translation.en: that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.zh: 我们是在阻止神毁灭世界？

translation.en: You're not acting like a family,
translation.zh: 你们这样子根本不像一家人

translation.en: not one that's about to save the world.
translation.zh: 根本不像要拯救世界的样子

translation.en: Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.zh: 因为你们连彼此都顾不上

translation.en: We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.zh: 我们也许还有机会 真的

translation.en: When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.zh: 在潘威廉的寺庙里 我看到了那个分离的符号

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.zh: 在潘威廉的寺庙里 我看到了那个分离的符号 在一幅工厂照片里 另一个发掘基地

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.zh: -石头是从那里来的 我们去那个基地 -好的

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like,
translation.zh: 但他们只有一半完整的符记 所以…

translation.en: No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.zh: 因为如果我们不能阻止他们 他们就会来找我们

translation.en: As long as we're smart about it.
-Let's go kill a god. -[Tommy] Let's do it.
There are a lot of guards here.
[Ku An Qi] This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.zh: 这里就是第一代五行刺客 把我们分开的地方

translation.en: [Ku An Qi] This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.zh: 这一世的五行刺客命很硬
这个东西害死了我叔叔

translation.en: How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.zh: 还要死多少个人 才能换回我家人？

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.zh: 孩子 你的问题是 你认为死亡是终点
你很快就会和他们相聚…

translation.en: [Tommy] That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.zh: 这里是熔化石头的地方 这是宿舍区

translation.en: -Those are the main pressing machines. -[Lu Xin] How do you know?
translation.zh: -这是主力碎石机 -你他妈怎么知道这些的？

translation.en: We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.zh: 我们必须小心 他们需要你来完成仪式 所以…

translation.en: -What do you want to do? -We're splitting up.
Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.zh: 我们不能分开 我们要分开他们

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.zh: 我对付赞 陆对付野兽

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
Try this. It's got good range.
translation.zh: 试试这个 射程很远
我发过誓 凡是让我想起 你父亲利用过我的东西

translation.en: I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.zh: 我发过誓 凡是让我想起 你父亲利用过我的东西 我都会一一消灭 首先是珍妮
我都会一一消灭 首先是珍妮

translation.en: And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
translation.zh: 然后我会杀你 事情就圆满了 五行刺客

translation.en: You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
translation.zh: 那你只能将就了 贱人

translation.en: The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.zh: 项链不在这里 如果找不到 我们就白费功夫了

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.zh: 他们不傻 汤米 我们去找其他人

translation.en: -The fuck were you thinking? -Wait. No. Stop.
translation.zh: -你他妈的在想什么？ -等等 住手
说 他们精神控制了你

translation.en: They told me I could see my family again,
translation.zh: 他们说我可以再见到我的家人

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
translation.zh: 我犯了错误 对不起…

translation.en: Mastery over the body has its perks.
translation.zh: 对身体的绝对控制自有其好处

translation.en: This is for all of us.

translation.zh: 你的朋友打败了谷安琪

translation.en: [in deep voice] I am Pan Gu, the first man.
Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.zh: 意识、身体、灵魂 尽在我掌握之中
兄弟 你现在不是自己！

translation.en: The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.zh: 可惜 你只有一个人

translation.en: Brother, I don't want to do this.
[in demon voice] Thank you for your sacrifice.
We can't do this without you.
-[Zulu] Come on. You can do it. -Fucking bitch.
I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们遇到更大的麻烦了 -陆！ -我们走吧
-发生了什么事？ -真的是你？ 喂

translation.en: Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.zh: 当然是我 不然是谁？

translation.en: -I can't hold. -[Lu Xin] Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
translation.zh: 我拉不住了 拉住 阿凯！

translation.en: -You guys know knots? -We're about to find out.
translation.zh: -你们会打结吗？ -试试就知道了

translation.en: [Tommy] We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.zh: 我们用这个把他们拉上来 绳子够了就告诉我

translation.en: Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.zh: 想想办法 你是五行刺客

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
Let me know when you guys are good.
translation.zh: 好的 准备好就告诉我

translation.en: All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
[Tommy] Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.zh: 我知道一条安全的出路 走吧

translation.en: Hold it, man. First, a toast.
translation.zh: 等等 先敬一杯 敬
阿凯 接下来我们做什么？

translation.en: I guess we're going on vacation then.
-We? I thought you could handle yourself. -[Lu Xin] What do you mean?
translation.zh: 我们？我以为… 你什么意思？你自己去

translation.en: Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.zh: 大家也都看到了 但我们没必要提起这件事

translation.en: -[Kai] You wanna spar? You wanna try me? -Do I want to spar?
translation.zh: -你想比试比试？你在挑战我？ -我想不想比试？

translation.en: I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin.
translation.zh: 你是五行刺客 我只是陆行刺客

translation.en: -[Tommy] You gonna let him say that? -Oh!
-[Zulu] Oh my God. That's crazy. -[Tommy] Guys, guys, guys.
translation.zh: -天哪 -我也会！ -大家 -太简单了吧

translation.en: -[Kai] Whoa, whoa, whoa! -[Tommy] He's going in. Get him in the water.
